LayoutCatalog.Name: 1. Bootstrap 5 design
LayoutCatalog.Description: This layout is nearly the same used for the Cosmos WPS product website, and it is a good layout to learn Cosmos.  It uses Bootstrap with Material Design principles, and jQuery, and it contains a number of template pages to help you kick-start your website development.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 3. California Design System
LayoutCatalog.Description: The Design System makes it easy for state digital teams to build accessible, consistent, and performant services and products to meet Californiansâ€™ needs.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 4. Tailwind CSS design
LayoutCatalog.Description: Quickly and easily get started with Bootstrap's compiled, production-ready files with this barebones example featuring some basic HTML and helpful links. Download all our examples to get started. Complete documentation on how to use Bootstrap can be found on the project website.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 5. Basic starter design
LayoutCatalog.Description: Carousel full cover starter template from Material Design. Documentation for how to use this theme can be found at GitHub.
